Package template.xml

Class XmlExample.XmlReadHandler

java.lang.Object
org.xml.sax.helpers.DefaultHandler
org.xml.sax.ext.DefaultHandler2
template.xml.XmlExample.XmlReadHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
ContentHandler, DTDHandler, EntityResolver, ErrorHandler, DeclHandler, EntityResolver2, LexicalHandler
Enclosing class:
XmlExample
class XmlExample.XmlReadHandler extends DefaultHandler2
A handler to read in the XML file just written. Better do this in an own file, this is just an example.
